what: Load Columbia County HUC12 watersheds layer from Geoserver
title: nrcs-practices
code: columbia_huc12_url <- "http://142.93.92.104:8080/geoserver/Columbia/ows?service=WFS&version=1.0.0&request=GetFeature&typeName=Columbia:all_columbia_huc_12s&outputFormat=application/json"  # Convert GeoJSON to an sf object # drop geometry, we only need watershed names here columbia_huc12s <- geojson_sf(columbia_huc12_url) %>%     sf::st_drop_geometry() %>%     distinct(hc12_name,huc12)

title: nrcs-practices
text: Dataset provided SCC many unique watersheds file? Warning: Practice code 430 > 1 practice names . Filter NRCS data include HUC12 Columbia County many Huc12s Columbia County?
code: data_path <- system.file("extdata", "20040101-20240430 NRCS Practices_edited_v3.xlsx", package = "middlesnake")  nrcs_data <- readxl::read_xlsx(data_path) %>%   janitor::clean_names() nrcs_data %>%     pull(huc12) %>%     unique() %>%     length() #> [1] 1289 nrcs_data %>%     cnt(practice_code,n_distinct_vars = practice_name) %>%     filter(n_practice_name>1) #> # A tibble: 1 × 4 #>   practice_code n_practice_name     n n_cumulative #>   <chr>                   <int> <int>        <int> #> 1 430                         2  1106       105975 nrcs_data %>%     filter(practice_code==430) %>%     distinct(practice_name) #> # A tibble: 2 × 1 #>   practice_name               #>   <chr>                       #> 1 Irrigation Pipeline         #> 2 Irrigation Water Conveyance nrcs_columbia <-  nrcs_data %>%   filter(huc12 %in% columbia_huc12s$huc12 ) %>%   rename(same_code=land_unit_has_multiple_instances_of_same_practice_code,          same_code_and_year=land_unit_has_multiple_instances_of_same_practice_code_applied_the_same_year) nrcs_columbia %>%   cnt(n_distinct_vars = huc12) #> # A tibble: 1 × 3 #>   n_huc12     n n_cumulative #>     <int> <int>        <int> #> 1      36 13516        13516

title: nrcs-practices
text: practice code applied multiple times land unit year, data likely duplicated removed summing applied amounts -NRCS Conservation Practices Data: Overview FAQs Oct-2024 land_unit_id 1 distinct huc12 Columbia County Columbia County 9084 distinct records land_unit_id,applied_year, practice_code Check distinct records land_unit_id,applied_year, practice_code match distinct applied_amount, land_unit_id,applied_year, practice_code listings
code: nrcs_columbia %>%     cnt(land_unit_id,n_distinct_vars = huc12) %>%    filter(n_huc12>1) #> # A tibble: 0 × 4 #> # ℹ 4 variables: land_unit_id <chr>, n_huc12 <int>, n <int>, n_cumulative <int> nrcs_columbia %>%     cnt(n_distinct_vars = c(land_unit_id,applied_year,practice_code)) #> # A tibble: 1 × 6 #>   n_land_unit_id n_applied_year n_practice_code n_land_unit_id_applied_y…¹     n #>            <int>          <int>           <int>                      <int> <int> #> 1           2408             21             112                       9084 13516 #> # ℹ abbreviated name: ¹​n_land_unit_id_applied_year_practice_code #> # ℹ 1 more variable: n_cumulative <int> nrcs_columbia %>%     cnt(n_distinct_vars = c(land_unit_id,applied_amount,applied_year,practice_code)) #> # A tibble: 1 × 7 #>   n_land_unit_id n_applied_amount n_applied_year n_practice_code #>            <int>            <int>          <int>           <int> #> 1           2408             1146             21             112 #> # ℹ 3 more variables: #> #   n_land_unit_id_applied_amount_applied_year_practice_code <int>, n <int>, #> #   n_cumulative <int> duplicated_practices <- nrcs_columbia %>%     group_by(land_unit_id,practice_code,applied_year) %>%     mutate(duplicates_id_yr_code=1:n()) %>%     ungroup() %>%     group_by(land_unit_id,practice_code,applied_year,applied_amount) %>%     mutate(duplicates_id_yr_code_amt=1:n()) %>%     ungroup() ids_where_amt_is_different <- duplicated_practices %>%      filter(duplicates_id_yr_code>1) %>%      filter(!duplicates_id_yr_code==duplicates_id_yr_code_amt) %>%      pull(land_unit_id) %>%      unique() duplicated_listings <- duplicated_practices %>%     filter(land_unit_id %in% ids_where_amt_is_different) %>%     select(land_unit_id,practice_name,applied_amount,applied_date,applied_year,starts_with("dup"), program) %>%     arrange(land_unit_id,applied_year)%>%     split(~land_unit_id)

title: nrcs-practices
text: Note: Consider applied_amount program removing/collapsing duplicates land_unit_id,applied_year, practice_code
